ygData.subject: Re: Skill caps
ygData.msgSnippet: No, actually you are not correct.   Casters have different skill caps on melee skills than fighters do. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard ... From: Chad Eldridge
ygData.messageBody:
No, actually you are not correct. Casters have different skill caps on melee skills than fighters do.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
-----Original Message-----
From: Chad Eldridge <chad@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 4:31 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Skill caps


No mstokes those formulas are not correct. The skill lvl formula, and this applies to all skills except languages, trade skills, swimming and stuff like that, is:

your lvl times 5 plus 5

so at lvl 1 your cap is 10
at lvl 4 your cap is 25

Marthanis Thundermage
Order of the Storm
15th Erudite Wizard
